title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia - Greatest Hits
description:
This is a collection of songs/jib-jab from the show It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia. Not to be confused with the weak OST available which only contains the filler tracks used to bridge scenes.

I scanned every episode for anything that could be considered musical; trimmed the fat; leveled the audio; labelled appropriately; and boom! There you have it: tasty treats.

I kept the songs in chronological order as a lot of them are linked. Also to anyone interested in learning the episodes from which the tracks were taken, this information can be found in the comments section of each track.

Enjoy!
